Definition.description: Axis positive direction is north. In a geographic or projected CRS, north is defined through the geodetic datum. In an engineering CRS, north may be defined with respect to an engineering object rather than a geographical direction.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:north

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately north-north-east.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:northNorthEast

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately north-east.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:northEast

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately east-north-east.
Axis positive direction is pi/2 radians clockwise from north.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:east

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately east-south-east.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:eastSouthEast

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately south-east.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:southEast

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately south-south-east.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:southSouthEast

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is pi radians clockwise from north.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:south

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately south-south-west.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:southSouthWest

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately south-west.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:southWest

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately west-south-west.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:westSouthWest

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is 3pi/2 radians clockwise from north.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:west

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately west-north-west.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:westNorthWest

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately north-west.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:northWest

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is approximately north-north-west.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:northNorthWest

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is up relative to gravity.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:up

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is down relative to gravity.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:down

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is in the equatorial plane from the centre of the modelled earth towards the intersection of the equator with the prime meridian.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:geocentricX

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is in the equatorial plane from the centre of the modelled earth towards the intersection of the equator and the meridian pi/2 radians eastwards from the prime meridian.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:geocentricY

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is from the centre of the modelled earth parallel to its rotation axis and towards its north pole.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:geocentricZ

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is towards the future.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:future

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is towards the past.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:past

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is towards higher column numbers.
Definition.name: columnPositive

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is towards lower pixel column numbers.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:columnNegative

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is towards higher row numbers.
Definition.name: rowPositive

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is towards lower pixel row numbers.
Axis positive direction is right in display.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:displayRight

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is left in display.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:displayLeft

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is towards top of approximately vertical display surface.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:displayUp

Definition.description: Axis positive direction is towards bottom of approximately vertical display surface.
Definition.name: urn:opengis:def:axisDirection:OGC:1.0:displayDown
